problems.title: Create a Max Heap and Print After Each Insertion
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given N integers. Create a Max Heap and print the heap after each insertion.
To maintain the max heap property, use upward heapify (percolate up) whenever a new element is inserted.
After inserting each element, print the current heap array.
